title: Malinga leads Sri Lanka to nine-run T20 win over England
content: (Reuters) – World champions Sri Lanka held off an England fightback to win by nine runs in a Twenty20 international at the Oval on Tuesday helped by an explosive innings from Thisara Perera and superb bowling from Lasith Malinga. Perera’s quick-fire 49 runs from 20 balls, having survived a dropped catch by Michael Carberry, enabled…
